response.overview: A government scheme sees newly widowed Santosh inherit her husband’s job as a police constable in the rural badlands of Northern India. When a low-caste girl is found raped and murdered, she is pulled into the investigation under the wing of charismatic feminist inspector Sharma.
response.tagline: Nothing is more dangerous than following orders.
response.title: Santosh

release_dates.note: Rio de Janeiro International Film Festival

results.name: SANTOSH Aims to Give You Lots to Discuss | TIFF
